oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The New Agenda for the White Southerner in His New South
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Short publication by Highlander Folk School outlining how to integrate and move toward justice in the New South. Some of these tactics include humanizing their fellow Southerners, accepting that Black Southerners have the same wants, hopes, and dreams as white Southerners, and that they must fight alongside them to truly establish a free and just society.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Civil rights; Race relations; Discrimination; College students; Segregation; Sit-down strikes; Race discrimination
